text: Stephen Holyday () (born ) is a municipal politician in Toronto, Ontario. He is the Councillor for Ward 2 Etobicoke Centre.https://www.thestar.com/news/toronto-election/2018/10/22/stephen- holyday-defeats-fellow-incumbent-john-campbell-in-ward-2-etobicoke-centre.html He was first elected to Toronto City Council in the 2014 city council election in the former Ward 3 in Etobicoke. ==Background== Holyday was born in Toronto, Ontario. He is the son of Doug Holyday who previously represented the ward, served as Mayor of Etobicoke and was briefly an MPP.
